name: robot-activity
description: Its a tool for mimicking one's day to day activity

robot-activity.keyboard.text.randomGener.description: Specifies the option to invoke a API to get random text to type in a file. If URL return an object then specifiy the target property with `@`symbol at the end of the url. Example `http://test.com//api@target.prop`

robot-activity.keyboard.keyStrokeDelay.description: Controls the delay in minute between every key press.

robot-activity.mouse.active.description: Controls the behavious of moving mouse over active window.

robot-activity.mouse.movementDelay.description: Controls the delay in minute in mouse movement.

robot-activity.mouse.movement.description: Controls the behaviour of the number of pixel moves on every operation.

robot-activity.files.switchBetweenRandom.description: Specifies the option to switch back and forth between generating files randomly or traverse available files.

robot-activity.files.onlyRandom.description: Specifies the option to traverse only random generated files. Only works if `#robot-activity.files.switchBetweenRandomAndAllExisting#` is truned off.

robot-activity.files.onlyExisting.description: Specifies the option to traverse only available files in the current workspace folder. Only works if `#robot-activity.files.switchBetweenRandomAndAllExisting#` is truned off.

robot-activity.files.traverseDelay.description: Controls the delay in minute after which the current action will be recycled.

robot-activity.files.filter.fileTypes.description: Specifies the option to filter certain file types.

robot-activity.files.filter.excludeFolde.description: Specifies the option to filter certain folder on which the action will not perform. The path should be a absulate or raltive path related to the current workspace.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
